fields.description:
*Assessment*

Having the ability to cancel a stack update would fit well the UpdateStack epic - EUCA-11536.
Short summary below:
{quote}
After a stack update has begun, you can cancel the stack update if the stack is still in the {{UPDATE_IN_PROGRESS}} state. After an update has finished, you cannot cancel it. You can, however, update a stack again with any previous settings.

If you cancel a stack update, the stack is rolled back to the stack configuration that existed prior to initiating the stack update.
{quote}

comments.body:
*Eucalyptus Version*

{{4.3.0-0.25026.354.20160712git783d0ca.el7}}

*Steps*

# Create stack using linked {{cfn-as-create-update-policies-test-min.json}} template:
{code}
[root@c-34 ~]# euform-create-stack UpdatePolicyTest --template-file cfn-as-create-update-policies-test-min.json --parameter ImageId=emi-390608b5 --parameter EndPoint=http://cloudformation.c-13.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/ --parameter MinSize=2 --parameter MaxSize=4 --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --region testrunner-admin@
arn:aws:cloudformation::000341583960:stack/UpdatePolicyTest/6b76cd83-fe8e-46b6-8eeb-8d7aaca64c6e
[root@c-34 ~]# euform-describe-stacks --region testrunner-admin@
STACK	UpdatePolicyTest	CREATE_IN_PROGRESS	User Initiated	AutoScaling Create and Update Policy Test - MVP for CreationPolicy and UpdatePolicy with Resource Signals (Ubuntu 16.04 or Greater)	2016-07-18T20:18:57.655Z
PARAMETER	ImageId		emi-390608b5
PARAMETER	InstanceType		m1.medium
PARAMETER	EndPoint		http://cloudformation.c-13.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
PARAMETER	MinSize		2
PARAMETER	MaxSize		4
...
[root@c-34 ~]# euform-describe-stacks --region testrunner-admin@
STACK	UpdatePolicyTest	CREATE_COMPLETE		AutoScaling Create and Update Policy Test - MVP for CreationPolicy and UpdatePolicy with Resource Signals (Ubuntu 16.04 or Greater)	2016-07-18T20:18:57.655Z
PARAMETER	ImageId		emi-390608b5
PARAMETER	InstanceType		m1.medium

{code}
# {{UpdateStack}} using linked {{cfn-as-create-update-policies-update-launchconfig.json}} template.
{code}
[root@c-34 ~]# euform-update-stack UpdatePolicyTest --template-file cfn-as-create-update-policies-update-launchconfig.json --parameter ImageId=emi-390608b5 --parameter EndPoint=http://cloudformation.c-13.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/ --parameter MinSize=2 --parameter MaxSize=4 --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --region testrunner-admin@
arn:aws:cloudformation::000341583960:stack/UpdatePolicyTest/6b76cd83-fe8e-46b6-8eeb-8d7aaca64c6e
{code}
# Confirm stack is in {{UPDATE_IN_PROGRESS}} state then cancel the update:
{code}
[root@c-34 ~]# euform-describe-stacks --region testrunner-admin@
STACK	UpdatePolicyTest	UPDATE_IN_PROGRESS	User Initiated	AutoScaling Create and Update Policy Test - MVP for CreationPolicy and UpdatePolicy with Resource Signals (Ubuntu 16.04 or Greater)	2016-07-18T20:18:57.655Z
PARAMETER	ImageId		emi-390608b5
PARAMETER	InstanceType		m1.medium
PARAMETER	EndPoint		http://cloudformation.c-13.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
PARAMETER	MinSize		2
PARAMETER	MaxSize		4
OUTPUT	AutoScalingGroup	UpdatePolicyTest-AutoScalingGroup-ZXZ5HICKOW8JX

[root@c-34 ~]# euform-cancel-update-stack UpdatePolicyTest --region testrunner-admin@

[root@c-34 ~]# euform-describe-stacks --region testrunner-admin@
STACK	UpdatePolicyTest	UPDATE_ROLLBACK_IN_PROGRESS	Stack update was canceled by user.	AutoScaling Create and Update Policy Test - MVP for CreationPolicy and UpdatePolicy with Resource Signals (Ubuntu 16.04 or Greater)	2016-07-18T20:18:57.655Z
PARAMETER	ImageId		emi-390608b5
PARAMETER	InstanceType		m1.medium
PARAMETER	EndPoint		http://cloudformation.c-13.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
PARAMETER	MinSize		2
PARAMETER	MaxSize		4
OUTPUT	AutoScalingGroup	UpdatePolicyTest-AutoScalingGroup-ZXZ5HICKOW8JX
{code}
# Confirm stack reaches {{UPDATE_ROLLBACK_COMPLETE}} state, then check instance resources:
{code}
